content: During the quarter, we began scaling our user acquisition spend and saw 17% year-over-year new subscriber growth for Zoosk, which gives us confidence in our ability to return Zoosk, our largest brand, to revenue growth. Once weâre able to ramp up user acquisition, we saw solid results, including a 17% year-on-year increase in new subscribers and a 19% increase in organic traffic during the quarter on our Zoosk platform. Sparkâs monthly average revenue per user, or monthly ARPU, decreased to $19.30 in the second quarter of 2022 compared to $20.96 in the same period of 2021.
